Name: Warden Airship
Description:
Flying Transport unit, can use defensive matrix and lockdown.

TIP: The Warden Airship takes a bit of time to reach accelerate to its max speed.

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to cancel all orders and stop moving.
Root.Name: Stop

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to stay where they are and attack enemies that are within range. Units will neither chase down enemies nor move to engage.
Root.Name: Hold Position

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip:
Surrounds a friendly unit with a shield that can absorb 0 damage.
Caster is immobile while active.
Effect is disabled when the caster is out of energy, the targets is out of range or the target's shield is depleted.

TIP: While the ability has a casting range of 7, the target can move around in a radius of 12.
Root.Name: Defensive Matrix

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip:
Disables a target unit rendering it unable to attack or use abilities for as long as its active.
Caster is immobile while active.
Drains energy of the caster until its energy is depleted or the target is dead.
Final cost of 50 Energy.

Can target mechanical and psionic units.
Root.Name: Interference Matrix

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to move to the target area or follow the target unit. Scan-moving units will not engage enemies.
Root.Name: Scan Move

Root.Tooltip: Orders selected units to patrol between their current position and the target area. Units will attack enemies and move to engage nearby enemies.
Root.Name: Patrol

Root.Tooltip: Loads units into the Warden Airship's hold.
Root.Name: Load

Root.Tooltip: Drops the current order without performing it, and allows you to select a different order.
Root.Name: Cancel

Root.Tooltip:
Any unit's spotted by the searchlight will be targeted by surrounding units and will be recieve increased damage.

Channeled for about 10 seconds
Root.Name: Searchlights

Behaviors.Tooltip: This unit can detect cloaked or burrowed units within its sight range.
Behaviors.Name: Detector
